change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Informe del Obispo de Durango sobre las misiones 1789
did.abstract: Holograph report concerning the missions throughout the Durango bishopric. Includes a chart showing each of the missions, the province, and the indigenous groups.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Informe del Obispo de Durango sobre las misiones (MS 187). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Paul M. Roca, 1980.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Lorenzo became the Bishop of Durango in 1783.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph report concerning the missions throughout the Durango bishopric. Includes a chart showing each of the missions, the province, and the indigenous groups.

relatedmaterial.p: Photocopy. Original in Berkeley, Ca. : University of California Bancroft Library. Hubert Howe Bancroft Collection.
